name: Maps Deriction
author: Youssef Bouhalba

sections.description:
help your Visitors the get your address, and send them to you.

you can generate your own shortcode

attributes

  1. place:the adress , or the name of your campany location .
  2. map_width:the width of map.(100 like value mean 100% of width ).
  3. map_height:the height of map.(80 like value mean 80% of height ).
  4. zoom :A value from 0 (the world) to 21 (street level).
  5. map_type:Display any kind of maps you want (Hybrid,Roadmap,Satellite).

Exemple

[locate place=”Mohammed 6 , ouarzazate , Morroco” map_type=”HYBRID” map_width=”100″ map_height=”80″ zoom=”16″]

How To Use it
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Locate deriction’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select maps-deriction.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download maps-deriction.zip
  2. Extract the maps-deriction.zip directory to your computer
  3. Upload the maps-deriction directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Why should install this plugin?

He able to show your compnay adress , and detect your visitors location , and of course make a connection between them and you

short_description: The easiest to use Google maps , Get your current location and travel to your destination
